name: Jason
story: Jason is a 24 year old graduate of University of Toronto St. George Campus that cannot find a job. He requires some money for food so that he survive the winter nights in bahen while he tries to find a job

name: Johnathon
story: Johnathon is a 68 year old veteran that suffers from PSTD and very recently a stroke. He requires some money for his medication and an operation to remove the infested cyst on his back.

name: Johnny
story: Johnny is a 39 year old single father that recently declared backrupcy and had his property confiscated as a result. He only asks for enough money to feed his 8 year old son

name: Brian
story: Brian is a 24 year that wishes to be an accountant after leaving the adult industry. She requires some funds for a makeup in her upcoming interview.

name: Vanessa
story: Vanessa is a black lesbian muslum refugee dealing with depression and schizophrenia.
